. China can help ease imbalances by raising the value of its currency, Olivier Blanchard said. Tablets and Beyond January 19, 2011 OpenERP has launched a significant upgrade designed to appeal to small and mid-sized businesses both for its functionality and its pricing. OpenERP is a good example of a company using open source to target a piece of the market that has been overlooked by some of the larger, more established vendors, said 451 Group analyst Jay Lyman. "The quarterback position, that's the nature of it," Michael Vick said of the swings between praise and criticism. Everything's thrown on your shoulders as a quarterback. "I accept it. I respect it. That's the responsibility that you take on when you get up under the center.
